data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"    layout_width="fill_parent"    layout_height="fill_parent"    background="#FF000000"    orientation="vertical" >    <AtlasViewPager        id="@+id/bus_atlas_gallery"        layout_width="fill_parent"        layout_height="height*0.7"        fadingEdge="none"        function="atlas_view_pager" />    <TextView        id="@+id/bus_atlas_title"        layout_width="fill_parent"        layout_height="wrap_content"        layout_below="@+id/bus_atlas_gallery"        layout_marginLeft="10dp"        layout_marginRight="10dp"        layout_marginTop="10dp"        function="title"        singleLine="true"        textColor="#FFFFFFFF"        textSize="18dp" />    <TextView        id="@+id/bus_atlas_desc"        layout_width="fill_parent"        layout_height="wrap_content"        layout_below="@+id/bus_atlas_title"        layout_marginLeft="10dp"        layout_marginRight="10dp"        layout_marginTop="10dp"        function="desc"        textColor="#A0A1A0"        textSize="12dp" />    <LinearLayout        layout_width="fill_parent"        layout_height="30dp"        layout_alignBottom="@+id/bus_atlas_gallery"        function="head_dot"        gravity="center_vertical|right"        orientation="horizontal"        paddingRight="10dp" /></RelativeLayout>

list.data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"    layout_width="fill_parent"    layout_height="fill_parent"    orientation="vertical" >    <ImageView        layout_width="height*0.47"        layout_height="height*0.7"        layout_gravity="center_horizontal"        contentDescription="@null"        function="image"        scaleType="centerCrop"        src="head_placeholder" /></LinearLayout>
